name: Alvin the Albino Bat
description: One of a kind original art clay sculpture. Hand sculpted and painted by me, This is Alvin the albino bat. He is a budgie , my idea of what to call a pudgy bat! :)  He is about an inch and a half tall! From wing tip to wing tip 3 inches wide!

name: Stinky the Garlic Vampire Hunter
description:
A Vampire Hunter's spirit brought back and bound to a doll with a giant bulb of Garlic as a head.  Striking fear and funk into the hearts and nostrils of Vampires everywhere, Stinky is constantly looking for Vampires that can't smell him coming. 

Based on a vinyl toy covered with polymer clay and acrylic ink.

4.5 inches tall

This is an Art Toy not intended for Children under 13 years old.
